verses.verse: Then <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and her <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6989>Keturah.<s%>
And she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H2175>Zimran,<s%> and <S%H3370>Jokshan,<s%> and <S%H4091>Medan,<s%> and <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and <S%H3435>Ishbak,<s%> and <S%H7744>Shuah.<s%>

And <S%H3370>Jokshan<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7614>Sheba,<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1719>Dedan<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H805>Asshurim,<s%> and <S%H3912>Letushim,<s%> and <S%H3817>Leummim.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian;<s%> <S%H5891>Ephah,<s%> and <S%H6081>Epher,<s%> and <S%H2585>Hanoch,<s%> and <S%H28>Abida,<s%> and <S%H420>Eldaah.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6989>Keturah.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had unto <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>

But unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6370>concubines,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> had, <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> and sent them <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> while he <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>lived,<s%> <S%H6924>eastward,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H776>country.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H2416>lived,<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> threescore and <S%H7657>fifteen<s%> <S%H8141><s%> <S%H2568><s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

Then <S%H85>Abraham<s%> gave up the <S%H1478>ghost,<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> old <S%H7872>age,<s%> an old <S%H2205>man,<s%> and <S%H7649>full<s%> of years; and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> him <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6714>Zohar<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4471>Mamre;<s%>

The <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7069>purchased<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> was <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6912>buried,<s%> and <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3327>Isaac;<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H5973>by<s%> the well <S%H883>Lahai-roi.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah's<s%> <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> unto Abraham: <S%H85><s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> by their <S%H8034>names,<s%> according to their <S%H8435>generations:<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> <S%H5032>Nebajoth;<s%> and <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> and <S%H110>Adbeel,<s%> and <S%H4017>Mibsam,<s%>
And <S%H4927>Mishma,<s%> and <S%H1746>Dumah,<s%> and <S%H4854>Massa,<s%>
Hadar, <S%H2316><s%> and <S%H8485>Tema,<s%> <S%H3195>Jetur,<s%> <S%H5305>Naphish,<s%> and Kedemah: <S%H6929><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> are their <S%H8034>names,<s%> by their <S%H2691>towns,<s%> and by their <S%H2918>castles;<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5387>princes<s%> according to their <S%H523>nations.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> and he gave up the <S%H1478>ghost<s%> and <S%H4191>died;<s%> and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And they <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> from <S%H4480>Havilah<s%> <S%H2341><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H7793>Shur,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> as thou <S%H935>goest<s%> toward <S%H804>Assyria:<s%> and he <S%H5307>died<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brethren.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H1121>son:<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3205>begot<s%> <S%H853><s%> Isaac: <S%H3327><s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> to <S%H802>wife,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian<s%> of <S%H4480>Padan-aram,<s%> <S%H6307><s%> the <S%H269>sister<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H6279>entreated<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5227>for<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> was <S%H6135>barren:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H6279>entreated<s%> of him, and <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H2029>conceived.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> struggled <S%H7533>together<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> her; and she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> it be <S%H3651>so,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> am <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H2088>thus?<s%> And she <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, <S%H8147>Two<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> are in thy <S%H990>womb,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> manner of <S%H3816>people<s%> shall be <S%H6504>separated<s%> from thy <S%H4480>bowels;<s%> <S%H4578><s%> and the one <S%H3816>people<s%> shall be <S%H553>stronger<s%> than the other <S%H4480>people;<s%> <S%H3816><s%> and the <S%H7227>elder<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H6810>younger.<s%>
And when her <S%H3117>days<s%> to be <S%H3205>delivered<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there were <S%H8380>twins<s%> in her <S%H990>womb.<s%>

And the <S%H7223>first<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H132>red,<s%> all <S%H3605>over<s%> like an <S%H8181>hairy<s%> <S%H155>garment;<s%> and they <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6215>Esau.<s%>

And after <S%H310>that<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> out, and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> took <S%H270>hold<s%> on <S%H6215>Esau's<s%> <S%H6119>heel;<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when she <S%H3205>bore<s%> them.

And the <S%H5288>boys<s%> <S%H1431>grew:<s%> and <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H3045>cunning<s%> <S%H6718>hunter,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H7704>field;<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was a <S%H8535>plain<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> in <S%H168>tents.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he did <S%H6310>eat<s%> of his <S%H6718>venison:<s%> but <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2102>sod<s%> <S%H5138>pottage:<s%> and <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> was faint: <S%H5889><s%>

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3938>Feed<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H4480>with<s%> that <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H122>red<s%> pottage; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am <S%H5889>faint:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> was his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H123>Edom.<s%>
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4376>Sell<s%> me this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1062>birthright.<s%>

And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am at the <S%H1980>point<s%> to <S%H4191>die:<s%> and what <S%H4100>profit<s%> shall <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1062>birthright<s%> do to me?

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7650>Swear<s%> to me this <S%H3117>day;<s%> and he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto him: and he <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1062>birthright<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H5138>pottage<s%> of <S%H5742>lentils;<s%> and he did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and went his <S%H1980>way:<s%> thus <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H959>despised<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1062>birthright.<s%>
